alert.note: Alert for Posey (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 7:22PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Posey, southwestern Henderson, northeastern Crittenden and Union Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 622 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Uniontown, or 7 miles west of Morganfield, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Morganfield, Breckinridge Center and Uniontown around 630 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Corydon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for southern Illinois...southwestern Indiana...and western and northwestern Kentucky.
